casebody.data:
No. 08-1314. Delbert Williamson, et al., Petitioners v. Mazda Motor of America, Inc., et al. 560 U.S. 923, 130 S. Ct. 3348,

176 L. Ed. 2d 1218,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 4352. May 24, 2010.

Petition for writ of cer-tiorari to the Court of Appeal of California, Fourth Appellate District, Division Three, granted limited to Question 1 presented by the petition.

Same case below, 167 Cal. App. 4th 905, 84 Cal. Rptr. 3d 545.
